Harlingen.Valle Vista Mall: Valle Vista Mall is a regional shopping mall located in Harlingen, Texas, off Interstate 2 (Expressway 83) at the intersection of Dixieland Road and Tyler Avenue. It has 651,000 square feet (60,500 m2) of gross leasable area. It is anchored by Big Lots, Dillard's, Gold's Gym, J. C. Penney, Rack Room Shoes, and Sears.
